system.text_34: E.g. the server count Quota for the @:dictionary.domain/@:dictionary.project limits 2 by default, and the same Quota for Alibaba Cloud limits 5 servers, the @:dictionary.project/@:dictionary.domain can create 2 Alibaba Cloud servers at most.
system.text_36: Each Quota is divided into two parts, the first half is the application scope of the rule, and the second half is the specific quotas.
system.text_37: Please fill in an integer greater than 1 or a negative number (a negative number means unlimited)
system.text_38: When adding a quota rule, if the application scope of the new rule overlaps with an existing rule, the existing rule will be overridden.

system.dingding.after: Meanwhile, DingTalk channels should be enabled for the recipients.

system.wecom.where_to_find_corp_id: Where to find: Log in to the WeCom management console as an administrator -> My Company -> Get the CorpId
system.wecom.where_to_find_agent_id: Where to find: Log in to the WeCom management console as an administrator -> Application Management -> Create an application -> Get application AgentID in the application details
system.wecom.where_to_find_secret: Where to find: Log in to the WeCom management console as an administrator -> Application Management -> Create an application -> Get application credentials in the application details

system.wf_role_scope_system: When the scope of the approver is global, all users with matching roles in the whole system can approve the ticket
system.wf_role_scope_domain: When the scope of the approver is a domain, according to the domain of the applied resource, users with specified roles in all projects that match the domain can approve the ticket
system.wf_role_scope_project: When the scope of the approver is a project, users with matching roles in the project attributable to the application resource can approve the ticket
system.wf_role_scope_none: When a ticket is initiated, the ticket cannot be initiated when the corresponding role cannot be found according to the scope of the approver
system.wf_role_scope_placeholder: Please select the scope of the approver
system.text_583: Please specify an approval role or approver for each approval link
system.text_585: The permission will take effect ONLY when the users join the specified project with the role

tooltip.system_policy: The operation is not applicable to system policies

system.text_589: Reminder: The update frequency of project resource statistics is 15min/time, so newly added/deleted resources will not be updated to the statistics here in real time.

identity$password_unique_history_check.label: Historical Password Uniqueness
identity$password_unique_history_check.desc: The option is appicable to local users' password ONLY, which defines a N such that the new password should not be identical to the last N passwords set in history. Zero means no limit.

identity$password_minimal_length.label: Minimum Password Length
identity$password_minimal_length.desc: The option is appicable to local users' password ONLY, which requires the minimum password length. The default is 6 characters.

identity$password_error_lock_count.label: Maximal Consecutive Failed Logins
identity$password_error_lock_count.desc: The option is appicable to local users' password ONLY. The upper limit of the number of consecutive failed logins. When the number of consecutive failed logins exceeds the value, the user will be locked. The locked user needs to be manually enabled by the administrator. Zero means no limit.

identity$password_expiration_seconds.label: Password Expiration Seconds
identity$password_expiration_seconds.desc: The option is appicable to local users' password ONLY, which defines the expiration seconds of the password. Zero means no limit

identity$password_char_complexity.label: Password Complexity
identity$password_char_complexity.desc: The option is appicable to local users' password ONLY. The types of password characters must be N types of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and symbols. The valud of N is between 1 and 4

identity$token_expiration_seconds.label: Token Expiration Seconds
identity$token_expiration_seconds.desc: The expiration seconds of an token. The default is 86400 seconds (1 day).

identity$no_action_logout_seconds.label: Web console session timeout
identity$no_action_logout_seconds.desc: After the user has no operation in the current period of time, the login information will be invalid and needs to be logged in again. Zero means detection is not turned on.

yunionapi$is_forget_login_user.label: Log out and clear user information
yunionapi$is_forget_login_user.desc: After enabled, logging out will clear the logged in user information. To log in again, you need to re-enter your user name and password.

common$non_default_domain_projects.label: Three-level Resource Hierarchy
common$non_default_domain_projects.desc: If enabled, resources are organized in system/domain/project three-level hierarchy instead of system/project two-level hierarchy. The default is disabled, and it cannot be disabled after it is enabled.

yunionapi$show_captcha.label: Login Captcha
yunionapi$show_captcha.desc: If enabled, login Captcha is required on login

yunionapi$enable_totp.label: MFA Authentication
yunionapi$enable_totp.desc: If enabled, a user with MFA-enabled will be required to be authenticated against TOTP token

yunionapi$session_level_auth_cookie.label: Non-persistent Session
yunionapi$session_level_auth_cookie.desc: If enabled, after closing the browser, the login session will be invalidated immediately

yunionapi$return_full_domain_list.label: IAM Domain Login
yunionapi$return_full_domain_list.desc: If enabled, a domain input field is display in login form and user can specify login domain

compute$enable_pending_delete.label: Server and Disk Recyclebin
compute$enable_pending_delete.desc: If enabled, the deleted servers and disks are not removed immediately but kept in pending-deleted status for a period of time

compute$pending_delete_expire_seconds.label: Server and Disk Recycle Duration
compute$pending_delete_expire_seconds.desc: How long the pending-deleted servers and disks are kept in recyclebin

common$api_server.label: Web Console Address
common$api_server.desc: Set the WEB console access address

notify$verify_email_url_path.label: Email Verification Address
notify$verify_email_url_path.desc: Set the URL of the verification email

image$enable_pending_delete.label: Image Recyclebin
image$enable_pending_delete.desc: If enabled, the deleted images are not removed immediately but kept in pending-deleted status for a period of time

image$pending_delete_expire_seconds.label: Image Recycle Duration
image$pending_delete_expire_seconds.desc: How long the pending-deleted images are kept in recyclebin

baremetal$auto_register_baremetal.label: Baremetal Automatic Registration
baremetal$auto_register_baremetal.desc: If enabled, Baremetal Agent will register it to the @:brand platform and reset the BMC information after receiving a PXE request from any physical machine. Please be careful to enable automatic registration

baremetal$default_ipmi_password.label: Default IPMI Password for Baremetal
baremetal$default_ipmi_password.desc: The default password when resetting the BMC information of the barenetal machine when registering the baremetal by the pre-registration or automatic registration

common$enable_quota_check.label: Quota Check
common$enable_quota_check.desc: If enabled, new resources are checked against project or domain quota limits

common$global_http_proxy.label: Global Proxy
common$global_http_proxy.desc: If enabled, the global proxy will be used for the following scenarios: downloading configuration and @:dictionary.rate data, downloading @:dictionary.public_env images, importing image from Image market, uploading image from URL, etc.

yunionapi$force_single_session_login.label: Single session login switch
yunionapi$force_single_session_login.desc: After the single session login switch is turned off, the same user can log in in multiple browsers at the same time. After it is turned on, they can only log in in one browser at the same time.

compute$enable_pre_allocate_ip_addr.label: Automatically assign IP switch
compute$enable_pre_allocate_ip_addr.desc: After opening, we will automatically allocate IP when creating a new resource. After closing, we will no longer automatically allocate IP, and the IP reserved in this system cannot be guaranteed not to be allocated! (Only @:dictionary.private_env and @:dictionary.public_env)

compute$cloudaccount_health_status_check.label: Account Health Check switch
compute$cloudaccount_health_status_check.desc: After opening, it will automatically check whether the cloud has the ability to create resources according to the balance information, and the health check can be closed under special circumstances! (Only @:dictionary.public_env)

meter$exchange_rate_available.label: Multi-Currency Bill Combined
meter$exchange_rate_available.desc: If enabled, it will support the conversion of bills in different currencies to the same currency for display in the Cost module at a fixed exchange rate, which you can change in the Cost - Exchange Rate page.

meter$cost_conversion_available.label: Adjusted Price
meter$cost_conversion_available.desc: If enabled, a new secondary pricing policy will be supported under the system administration back office and all expense bills in the non-system administration back office will be displayed at the price after secondary pricing.

meter$cost_conversion_origin.label: Origin Bill
meter$cost_conversion_origin.desc: After secondary pricing is enabled, do you support domain and project view to view the original bill

common$ignore_nonrunning_guests.label: Shutdown Servers doesn't occupy resources switch
common$ignore_nonrunning_guests.desc: Turned on by default, shutdown servers no longer occupy host CPU and memory resources, but when the host resources are fully allocated, it will cause the servers to fail to boot properly. When turned off, the shutdown servers will occupy the host CPU and memory resources so that they will not be allocated.

compute$enable_auto_switch_server_sku.label: Give priority to ensuring the success of the new virtual machine
compute$enable_auto_switch_server_sku.desc: When opening, if the sku is sold out and does not match, we will automatically switch to the sku of the same specification and try to create.

log$syslog_url.label: External Syslog Server URL
log$syslog_url.desc: Export audit log to external syslog server, address format is proto://<ip>:<port>@idstr, e.g. tcp://192.168.2.100:514@cloud

yunionapi$enable_syslog_webservice.label: Enable Syslog WebService
yunionapi$enable_syslog_webservice.desc: Enable Syslog WebService, external audit system can fetch audit logs from this web service

yunionapi$syslog_webservice_username.label: Syslog WebService Account
yunionapi$syslog_webservice_username.desc: After Syslog WebService is enabled，you need to add Syslog WebService account

yunionapi$syslog_webservice_password.label: Syslog WebService Password
yunionapi$syslog_webservice_password.desc: After Syslog WebService is enabled，you need to add Syslog WebService password

compute$enable_tls_migration.label: Enable TLS migration
compute$enable_tls_migration.desc: When enabled, KVM virtual machine hot migration will use TLS to encrypt data.

yunionapi$enable_organization.label: Organizational structure switch
yunionapi$enable_organization.desc: After enabling, you can customize the level to control the permissions of the project, and support filtering and viewing in the resource list.

common$create_server_auto_start.label: Automatically start after creating a new virtual machine
common$create_server_auto_start.desc: It is enabled by default. After the virtual machine is successfully created, it will start automatically. After shutdown, the newly created virtual machine is in the shutdown state by default.

common$server_delete_limit.label: Virtual machine deletion limit switch
common$server_delete_limit.desc: After being turned on, the virtual machine can be deleted only when it is turned off. There is no limit after being turned off!

compute$skip_server_by_sys_tag_keys.label: Skip virtual machine with specified system tag
compute$skip_server_by_sys_tag_keys.desc: When the cloud account is synchronized, the virtual machine with the set system tag will not be synchronized
compute$skip_server_by_sys_tag_keys.dialog_desc: Please enter the tag key manually. Multiple tag keys are separated by ',' in English, such as tagkey1 and tagkey2

compute$disable_sync_cloud_event.label: On-cloud log synchronization switch
compute$disable_sync_cloud_event.desc: It is off by default. When it is on, the operation logs on the @:dictionary.public_env will be synchronized.

compute$default_admin_security_group_id.label: Admin Security ID
compute$default_admin_security_group_id.desc: If set, the machine created by the @:dictionary.onpremise_env will be bound to the specified management security group by default. If the previous virtual machine is not bound to any management security group, it will be bound to the security group after the next system restart. The management security group is not visible to ordinary users.

yunionapi$hide_web_error_details.label: Error details hide switch
yunionapi$hide_web_error_details.desc: After opening, you can hide the detailed information of the operation, but you cannot hide it after closing it!

cloudmon$disable_ping_probe.label: Network ping detection
cloudmon$disable_ping_probe.desc: It is enabled by default, allowing automatic detection of the used IP in the classic network, and placing the IP in the reserved IP. When it is closed, it cannot be automatically detected.

meter$enable_prediction.label: Enable billing predict
meter$enable_prediction.desc: It is off by default. After it is on, you can view consumption trend and consumption forecast in the expense overview.

meter$share_resource_type.label: Allocated resource type
meter$share_resource_type.desc: The default is cloud resource type. By setting the allocation type, this type will be used for project allocation when doing project allocation.

meter$use_local_instance_project.label: Charging switch based on the current project of resources
meter$use_local_instance_project.desc: After activation, the resource costs corresponding to the rerun bill will be attributed to the latest project, and historical project changes will be ignored.

compute$enable_export_username_password.label: Virtual Machine Password Export Switch
compute$enable_export_username_password.desc: When enabled, includes account password information when exporting the virtual machine list through the platform (caution advised for large quantities)

common$enable_cloud_shell.label: CloudShell Switch
common$enable_cloud_shell.desc: After closing, the cloud management CloudShell entrance is hidden and users cannot use it!

webconsole$enable_watermark.label: WaterMark Switch
webconsole$enable_watermark.desc: It is on by default. After closing, the WebConsole watermark display will be hidden.

compute$local_sys_disk_min_size_gb.label: The minimum value of the local system disk
compute$local_sys_disk_min_size_gb.desc: Set the minimum value of the local system disk

compute$local_sys_disk_max_size_gb.label: The maximum value of the local system disk
compute$local_sys_disk_max_size_gb.desc: Set the maximum value of the local system disk

compute$local_data_disk_min_size_gb.label: The minimum value of the local data disk
compute$local_data_disk_min_size_gb.desc: Set the minimum value of the local data disk

compute$local_data_disk_max_size_gb.label: Maximum value of local data disk
compute$local_data_disk_max_size_gb.desc: Set the maximum value of the local data disk

common$time_zone.label: System time zone
common$time_zone.desc: Not set by default. After setting, the time will be displayed according to the system time zone setting.

compute$enable_auto_rename_project.label: Local project synchronization update switch
compute$enable_auto_rename_project.desc: By default, it is turned off. After being turned on, the name will be changed on the cloud, and the name of the local project will also be changed. If the cloud project is deleted, the local project will be deleted along with it (resources will not be directly deleted). Prerequisite: The cloud account is enabled to automatically create projects, and the local project only corresponds to one cloud project.

user.create_samluser_cloudgroup_extra: Corresponding to the user/group on the cloud, a collection of permissions

system.contact: Please configure Email, SMS, Dingtalk, Lark and WeCom in Channels.
system.password_char_complexity_2: Must contain at least two of numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters or symbols
system.password_char_complexity_3: Must contain at least three of numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters or symbols
system.password_char_complexity_4: Must contain numbers, lowercase letters, uppercase letters and symbols
system.global_http_proxy: If enabled, the global proxy will be used when downloading packages, downloading @:dictionary.public_env image lists, downloading @:dictionary.rate, mirror market list display, importing mirrors via URL, and pulling public mirror lists. The proxy service of cloud accounts needs to be configured separately in the multi-cloud management module
system.global_https_proxy_extra: If the requested url is https, https proxy is preferred
system.global_http_proxy_extra: It is recommended that the HTTPS proxy and HTTP proxy should fill at least one blank to represent a direct connection
system.global_https_proxy.label: Https Proxy
system.global_http_proxy.label: Http Proxy
system.global_http_proxy.error: At least one should be filled in if the HTTPS proxy and HTTP proxy are enabled
system.email_placeholder: Please fill in the email address
system.is_config_mail_tips: The system has not setup email notifcation channel
system.saml_doc: 通用saml相关参数获取方式
system.feishu_oauth2_doc: 飞书相关参数获取方式
system.dingtalk_oauth2_doc: 钉钉相关参数获取方式

notify.smshuawei.template.abnormal_login: Please input abnormal login template ID and the corresponding general signature channel number, e.g. template ID d7011c2d7ada43cc917e0478e40583e5 channel number 8822082908233

notify.smshuawei.template.verify_code.en: Please input verification template ID and the application channel number, e.g. ID d7011c2d7ada43cc917e0478e40583e5 channel number 8822082908233

Please input alarm template ID and the application channel number, e.g. ID d7011c2d7ada43cc917e0478e40583e5 channel number 8822082908233

notify.smshuawei.template.abnormal_login: Please input abnormal login template ID and the application channel number, e.g. ID d7011c2d7ada43cc917e0478e40583e5 channel number 8822082908233
